title: Wine Quality Prediction using MLOps
features: Built an end‑to‑end MLOps pipeline that ingests, validates, transforms, and models wine quality data, automating reproducible experiments with MLflow and containerized deployment via FastAPI.
Engineered a Docker‑based microservice that serves real‑time predictions, integrated CI/CD with GitHub Actions, and ensured 99%+ availability through robust logging and monitoring.
Optimized XGBoost hyperparameters using MLflow tracking, boosting model R² by 7% over baseline while maintaining versioned artifacts and reproducible workflows.
